name: Bird Hazard
description:
Hi, I made this game in 2 days and you can just play it for FUN. The game is made by using Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Dev.

(Some antivirus programs may detect the file as suspicious, but rest assured the file is completely safe. This problem happens to me as well.)

You can visit my website for game projects that I made(In Dev): https://anonmage.ml/
